talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Your last attempt didn't reflect so well
on you. <sp:5:0:0>Make sure you're good and ready
this time!
near0002: I expect a lot from you!
near0003: Don't die on me out there!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What's wrong? <sp:5:0:0>Don't tell me you're here
to quit the race.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>So, then. Ready to get running?<sp:0:4:0>The clock starts once you go through the
<clr:0000>first arch<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Get ready and start at your own leisure.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>I was afraid of that. <sp:5:0:0>At least no one can
say you don't know your limits.<sp:0:4:0>I expect you to come back here as soon
as you feel up to it, soldier. You know
you'll regret it if you don't!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Good.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>So why are you wasting time?! <sp:5:0:0>You're on
the clock, soldier!
talk0011:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_01>WELL DONE, SOLDIER!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Come back here so we can go over
the results!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Also...it'll cost <clr:0000>10 rupees <clr:ffff>per attempt.
Are you ready to give it a try?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Work_00>Hey! You! <sp:5:0:0>What was that half-hearted jog
out there?<sp:0:4:0>This is serious training, not a picnic in
the dunes! <sp:5:0:0>You failed this attempt. Get
back here, on the double!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Congratulations! <sp:5:1:0>Except for one thing.
I think you forgot the rules.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Work_00>Hey! You! <sp:5:0:0>You've gone off course!<sp:0:4:0>If you can't follow the rules I laid out,
this training session is over. <sp:5:0:0>Get back
here, on the double!
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Hey... <sp:5:0:0>Not bad!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>The Desert Race is a struggle between
your body's limits and the harsh desert
environment.<sp:0:4:0>Even among us Gerudo soldiers, there
aren't many who can finish the race.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>I remember you. <sp:5:0:0>You're the voe who
fought alongside our soldiers.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Very well! <sp:5:0:0>From now on, soldier, you're
at my mercy.<sp:0:4:0>Hope you're ready, because I'm going to
run you ragged!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>But first, some ground rules.<sp:0:4:0>In the Desert Race, you must <clr:0000>pass
through <sp:2:e:42:3c0043006900720063007500690074005f004400650073006500720074005f0043006800650063006b0050006f0069006e00740043006f0075006e007400ffff00cd> arches <clr:ffff>around the desert
before <clr:0000>reaching the goal<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The desert is hard on a runner! <sp:5:0:0>You
shouldn't hesitate to <clr:0000>use whatever
advantages you can think of<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>However, if you stray too far off course
or cross the finish line without passing
through all the arches, you fail.<sp:0:4:0>There's also a <clr:0000>time limit of<clr:ffff> <clr:0000><sp:2:e:46:400043006900720063007500690074005f004400650073006500720074005f00540069006d0065005f004c0069006d00690074005f004d0069006e00750074006500ffff00cd>:<sp:2:13:46:400043006900720063007500690074005f004400650073006500720074005f00540069006d0065005f004c0069006d00690074005f005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I don't
want anyone staying out for too long in
the desert conditions.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>If you can beat the record, there's some
<clr:0000>traditional Gerudo cloth<clr:ffff> in it for you!
talk0016:
Once you go through that, you have to
take the rest of the arches in the desert
in order.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>It's <clr:0000>10 rupees <clr:ffff>per attempt. Are you ready
to try the <clr:0000>Desert Race<clr:ffff>?
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_01>Oh well. I thought you had it in you...<sp:5:0:0>
You can still come by whenever you feel
up to the challenge.
talk0090:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Come back once you've made space for
your prize.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>I've heard about you. <sp:5:0:0>The voe who fought
alongside our soldiers, right?
talk0091:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>Do you still want to stop, even knowing
that I won't give back the <clr:0000>10 rupee<clr:ffff>
training fee?
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>The Desert Race is a harsh training
program. <sp:5:0:0>Make sure you're fully prepped
before you start your run.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait here while I get the arches ready.<sp:5:0:0>
It shouldn't be long.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Very well! <sp:5:0:0>From now on, soldier, you're at
my mercy.<sp:0:4:0>Hope you're ready, because I'm going to
run you ragged!
talk0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you want to test your limits further,
the cost is the usual <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>. What
do you think?
talk0081:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>You don't see these as often as you used
to in the desert, but they're used in an
elixir that increases your health.<sp:0:4:0>You'll want one on hand when things get
really tense.
talk0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>So, then. Ready to get running?<sp:0:4:0>The clock starts once you go through the
<clr:0000>first arch<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Get ready and start at your own leisure.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>The clock starts once you pass through
this <clr:0000>arch<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Prepare yourself and get started
at your leisure.<sp:0:4:0>Unless...<sp:5:0:0>you're not getting cold feet,
are you?
talk0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wanted to give you a <clr:0000>Gerudo scimitar<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But there's no room for it in that pouch
of yours.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>How about <clr:0000>10 arrows<clr:ffff> instead?
talk0084:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wanted to give you a <clr:0000>Gerudo scimitar<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But there's no room for it in that pouch
of yours.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You should come back once you've made
space for your prize.
talk0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wanted to give you a <clr:0000>Gerudo shield<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But there's no room for it in that pouch
of yours.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>How about <clr:0000>five arrows<clr:ffff> instead?
talk0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>As of today, you've graduated from a
mere trainee soldier.<sp:0:4:0>Come again if you ever want to test your
limits! You're welcome anytime.
talk0086:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wanted to give you a <clr:0000>Gerudo shield<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But there's no room for it in that pouch
of yours.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You should come back once you've made
space for your prize.
talk0072: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Huh! Not a bad attempt.<sp:0:4:0>Don't forget your prize.
talk0087:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wanted to give you a <clr:0000>hearty lizard<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But there's no room for it in that pouch
of yours.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You should come back once you've made
space for your prize.
talk0073: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>That's the kind of run I like to see.<sp:0:4:0>Here, eat this to cool down.
talk0088:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hmmm.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wanted to give you a <clr:0000>hydromelon<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But there's no room for it in that pouch
of yours.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You should come back once you've made
space for your prize.
talk0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>You finished the race and didn't get hurt.
That's pretty good!
talk0089: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>You came to claim your prize, right?
talk0075:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In the desert, even a little carelessness
can cost your life.
talk0076:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you've learned from this mistake, are
you ready to make another attempt?
It'll cost you <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk0077:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Would you like to try now? It's still only
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk0063:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is a training area for Gerudo warriors.<sp:0:4:0>The harsh program here requires stamina,
willpower, and smarts to cross the desert.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Greeting_00>Welcome to the starting line for the
<clr:0000>Desert Race<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm here to oversee the Desert Race and
give advice to any challengers.<sp:0:4:0>Up to now, only Gerudo warriors were
allowed to undergo training this rough.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>But since you've already proven yourself
in battle, we'll make an exception for you.
talk0078: <snd:Greeting_01>I'll be waiting for your next attempt!
talk0064:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Keep in mind that the arch <clr:0000>on the rocky
hill<clr:ffff> gets harder to see as you get closer.<sp:0:4:0>You can't see the <clr:0000>finish line<clr:ffff> from here,
but if you follow the arches in order,
you'll come across it eventually.
talk0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>If you can beat the record, there's some
<clr:0000>traditional Gerudo cloth<clr:ffff> in it for you!
talk0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>We both know you can do better. <sp:5:0:0>What do
you say to making another attempt for
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>?
talk0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>There are prizes in it for you based on
your results. Assuming you reach the
finish line at all.<sp:0:4:0>I want to see you go above and beyond,
soldier!
talk0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Do you remember how I told you to pass
through ALL of the arches before reaching
the goal?<sp:0:4:0>I'm sorry, but if you can't follow the rules,
you don't pass the test.
talk0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>To even approach Captain Teake's record
is an honorable showing!<sp:0:4:0>This is your reward. <sp:5:0:0>Take it with pride!
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>As of today, you've graduated from a
mere trainee soldier.<sp:0:4:0>Come again if you ever want to test your
limits! You're welcome anytime.
talk0068:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>That was a beautiful run! <sp:5:0:0>Here, eat this.
It should help you cool off.
talk0069:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We ask <clr:0000>10 rupees <clr:ffff>per attempt as a
training fee. Are you ready to try the
<clr:0000>Desert Race<clr:ffff>?
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'm glad to see you running again. <sp:5:0:0>Let me
see you go above and beyond, soldier!
talk0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I'm so proud to have produced a soldier
as hardy as you.
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Ahh, hello again. Are you here to try the
<clr:0000>Desert Race<clr:ffff>? We ask a training fee of
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff> per attempt.
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>You're welcome to try the <clr:0000>Desert Race <clr:ffff>as
many times as you want! <sp:5:0:0>It's <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>
per attempt. Ready to get started?
talk0058:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Looks like there's little but sand in your
wallet. <sp:5:0:0>Why don't you come back when
you have some rupees to spare?
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Greeting_01>What do you think you're doing?!<sp:0:4:0>On a real mission, the scavengers would
be picking your bones clean!
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Very well. <sp:5:0:0>I will be here if you feel like
trying again.<sp:0:4:0>It's my duty to support you until you can
cross the Desert Race's finish line!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>But there was a fire in your legs. <sp:5:0:0>What do
you say to making another attempt for
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>?
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Very well. <sp:5:0:0>If you ever want a rematch with
the desert, come see me.<sp:0:4:0>I'll support you through however many
attempts it takes!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>The rules of the Desert Race are simple.<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>Pass through all <sp:2:e:42:3c0043006900720063007500690074005f004400650073006500720074005f0043006800650063006b0050006f0069006e00740043006f0075006e007400ffff00cd> arches <clr:ffff>before
<clr:0000>reaching the goal<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>The desert is hard on a runner! <sp:5:0:0>You
shouldn't hesitate to <clr:0000>use whatever
advantages you can think of<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>However, if you stray too far off course
or cross the finish line without passing
through all the arches, you fail.<sp:0:4:0>There's also a <clr:0000>time limit of<clr:ffff> <clr:0000><sp:2:e:46:400043006900720063007500690074005f004400650073006500720074005f00540069006d0065005f004c0069006d00690074005f004d0069006e00750074006500ffff00cd>:<sp:2:13:46:400043006900720063007500690074005f004400650073006500720074005f00540069006d0065005f004c0069006d00690074005f005300650063006f006e006400ffff00cd><clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I don't
want anyone staying out for too long in
the desert conditions.
